subject: Soccer
World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: Every World Cup coach will have difficult decisions to make before the tournament opens, but few will face more second-guessing than Luiz Felipe Scolari. Give Scolari some help with your suggestions.
snippet: Every World Cup coach will have difficult decisions to make before the tournament opens, but few will face more second-guessing than Luiz Felipe Scolari. Give Scolari some help with your suggestions.
